content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":10562,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a/compensation.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"compensation.png\",\"name\":\"compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3e89e662-adc1-496c-97a7-98fe1743dd6a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":89},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Lithuania, your salary should be paid to you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"twice a month \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"unless you request your salary to be paid once a month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first (advance) payment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is equal to 30% of salary net pay and will be paid on the 20-25-the day of the month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rest \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"will be paid on the 5-10th of the following month. In case the mentioned days are not working days, the salary will be paid on the next working day after the corresponding calendar day.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please note that during the first month of employment, newcomers will not receive an advance payment\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At your request, the salary may be paid once - on the 5-10th of the following month to your nominated bank account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your pay slip will be sent to your work email address after payment. The pay slips will be protected with the last four digits of your personal code.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAPayrollLT@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Payroll LT\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
